column3:
Ryan and Adam love to play basketball.  They like it better than soccer and baseball.
ewlineTheir other friend, Jared, has his own basketball hoop.  He got it for his ninth birthday.
ewlineRyan got a football for his birthday and Adam got a skateboard.  They like their presents,
ewlinebut think the basketball hoop is better.  They play basketball at Jared's house with him
ewlineand any other kids who show up.  Alex and Brady come almost every day and Josh, Ty, and
ewlineMax come sometimes.  Next year, they all get to play on a basketball team.  They get to
ewlineplay at their school.  They are very excited about that and can't wait to play on a real
ewlineteam.  For now, they are practicing a lot and are trying to get really good.  They play
ewlineevery day they can.  They are trying to be as good as the NBA players they watch on TV.
ewlineThey dream of someday playing in the NBA.  They are sure it is going to happen.
column4: multiple: What do Ryan and Adam play at Jared's house?
column9: one: What sport do Ryan and Adam love to play?
column14: multiple: What do the boys get to play on at their school next year?
column19: multiple: What did Jared get for his ninth birthday?
